operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO user_notify_settings (user_id, peer_type, peer_id, show_previews, silent, mute_until, sound) VALUES (:user_id, :peer_type, :peer_id, :show_previews, :silent, :mute_until, :sound)

operation.name: SelectByUserId
operation.sql: SELECT id, show_previews, silent, mute_until, sound FROM user_notify_settings WHERE user_id=:user_id

operation.name: SelectByPeer
operation.sql: SELECT id, show_previews, silent, mute_until, sound FROM user_notify_settings WHERE user_id=:user_id AND peer_type = :peer_type AND peer_id=:peer_id

operation.name: SelectByUsers
operation.sql: SELECT id, show_previews, silent, mute_until, sound FROM user_notify_settings WHERE user_id=:user_id AND peer_type = 5

operation.name: SelectByChannels
operation.sql: SELECT id, show_previews, silent, mute_until, sound FROM user_notify_settings WHERE user_id=:user_id AND peer_type = 6

operation.name: SelectByAll
operation.sql: SELECT id, show_previews, silent, mute_until, sound FROM user_notify_settings WHERE user_id=:user_id AND peer_type = 7

operation.name: UpdateByPeer
operation.sql: UPDATE user_notify_settings SET show_previews = :show_previews, silent = :silent, mute_until = :mute_until, sound = :sound, is_deleted = :is_deleted WHERE user_id=:user_id AND peer_type = :peer_type AND peer_id=:peer_id

operation.name: DeleteNotAll
operation.sql: UPDATE user_notify_settings SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE user_id=:user_id AND peer_type <> 7
